1.title: Bridge and Tunnel
1.plot: Four college friends from Hoboken, NJ exchange anonymous tough love letters that put their friendships to the test. For one week, they must follow whatever their letters say as it will ultimately bring the group closer together or tear them apart.

2.title: LA Valley Girls
2.plot: Four friends from the lush life of California's San Fernando Valley exchange brutally honest and anonymous letters, pushing their friendships to the brink. For one week, they must follow the rules laid down in the letter, revealing secrets along the way.

3.title: Hollywood It Crowd
3.plot: Four Hollywood Hills club kids look to help their friends by exchanging anonymous tough love letters and must follow the rules laid down in the letter, confronting painful moments in their past.

4.title: Brazen Booties
4.plot: Four burlesque dancers exchange letters that suggest ways to improve each other's lives, including learning to cope with bruised family relationships, social anxiety and busy schedules.

5.title: College Kids
5.plot: Four college sophomores from Southern California anonymously exchange tough love letters, telling their friend how they really feel about them. Tackling issues of vulnerability, anxiety, and negative thoughts, can they help each other improve their soon-to-be adult life for the better?

6.title: Pretty Princesses
6.plot: Four New York party girls exchange brutally honest, anonymous letters that put their friendships to the test. Things could get ugly when a fashion model, a former track star, and a pop singer voice their true feelings, and another friend lays down an ultimatum.

7.title: San Diego Roomies
7.plot: Four college grads from San Diego State University tell each other how they really feel about each other through anonymous tough love letters. For one week, they must do whatever their letters say in hopes that they will transform their friends lives. At the end, they'll come together to talk about their week, and find out who wrote their letter.

8.title: OC Sisters
8.plot: Two feuding sisters and their two life-long best friends, all living in Orange County California, exchange anonymous tough love letters that push their relationships to the breaking point.

9.title: Atlanta Belles
9.plot: Four beautiful BFFs who party hard in the Atlanta nightlife tell each other how they really feel through anonymous tough love letters. For one week, they must do whatever their letters say. When the writers are revealed, so are deep secrets and the friendships are pushed to the very edge.

10.title: Friends Since Four
10.plot: Four lifelong besties from Central Pennsylvania exchange anonymous tough love letters that put their friendships to the test. Things heat up as the girls explore the origins of their insecurities, perfectionism, and privilege.

imdb.plot outline: In each stand-alone episode, four people close to one another draw names and anonymously write to the selected person a thoughtful yet totally honest letter outlining what, in their opinion, needs to be changed in order to improve and transform for the better the life of the recipient. For one week, each "reader" must follow all the rules and instructions outlined in the letter - culminating in a dramatic and emotionally charged meeting where the authors of each letter reveal themselves to their best friends.
imdb.title: The Letter
plot: In each stand-alone episode, four people close to one another draw names and anonymously write to the selected person a thoughtful yet totally honest letter outlining what, in their opinion, needs to be changed in order to improve and transform for the better the life of the recipient. For one week, each "reader" must follow all the rules and instructions outlined in the letter - culminating in a dramatic and emotionally charged meeting where the authors of each letter reveal themselves to their best friends.
